messages.subject: OT - Green websites
messages.msgSnippet: I know I mentioned a few of these a while back but here I am again with more... I love this site: http://www.coopamerica.org/ from here I clicked on the Green
messages.messageBody:
I know I mentioned a few of these a while back but here I am again with
more...

I love this site:
http://www.coopamerica.org/
from here I clicked on the Green Festival and you can listen to last
years pod casts from the festival (.http://www.greenfestivals.org/index.php)
....I just finished listening to my new favorite author David Suzuki!

from this site I clicked on SustainLane and found an online animated
show about an average family trying to get more green...I haven't
watched it yet to see but I think it's great for kids too. This site is
adding another feature of green product reviews but it isn't ready yet

another great one:
http://www.grist.org/
from here I clicked on Daily Grist and caught up on some green headlines
including Al Gore's teaming up with some celebs to have SOS (Save Our
Selves) and Live Earth concerts on 7/07/07 (uniting seven continents
with seven concerts)

and of course:
http://www.thegreenguide.com/

There were some great recommendations in the magazine "Natural Home" for
more sites.
That's all for now folks...
Amy
